We are your loyal customers from Hong Kong. It is regrettable to see your Hong Kong branch decided to collaborate with TVB and sponsor their actor Ricco Ng Wai Ho.

TVB is a Pro-Beijing TV Station that often reports biased or fake news in favor of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) and the Hong Kong Government to mislead audiences. Therefore, collaborating with TVB is no different from agreeing their behavior. Now, Hongkongese have no choice but to boycott Uniqlo's product until further explanation from Uniqlo. We look forward to your reply, thank you.
